pizzas.name: Marinara
pizzas.descriptions: Pizza Marinara is a traditional Italian pizza that is simple yet flavorful. It is made with a tomato sauce base and typically topped with garlic, oregano, and extra-virgin olive oil. Some variations may also include capers and anchovies, but the classic version is made without any additional toppings.

pizzas.name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
pizzas.descriptions: BBQ Chicken Pizza is made with a BBQ sauce base and is topped with cooked chicken, cheese, and sometimes red onions or cilantro. Buffalo Chicken Pizza is a spicy version of chicken pizza that features hot sauce, blue cheese, and cooked chicken.

pizzas.name: Carbonara Pizza
pizzas.descriptions: Carbonara pizza, which is a pizza that is topped with a mixture of eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

pizzas.name: Margherita
pizzas.descriptions: Margherita pizza is a classic Neapolitan pizza that is widely considered to be the original pizza. It is made with a simple combination of ingredients, including a tomato sauce base, mozzarella cheese, fresh basil, and extra-virgin olive oil.

pizzas.name: Ricardo
pizzas.descriptions: Pizza Ricardo is a delicious and flavorful dish that is enjoyed by many people all over the world. If you are looking for a pizza that is both satisfying and a little bit different, you may want to give Pizza Ricardo a try!

pizzas.name: Primavera
pizzas.descriptions: Primavera pizza is a type of pizza that is topped with fresh vegetables, typically including ingredients such as bell peppers, onions, mushrooms, and tomatoes. The name Primavera is derived from the Italian word for spring.

pizzas.name: Funghi
pizzas.descriptions: Fungi pizza, also known as Mushroom  pizza, is a type of pizza that features mushrooms as the main topping. This type of pizza is popular among vegetarians and those who enjoy the earthy, rich flavor of mushrooms.
